mechanic.name: Bounty - Armor Break
mechanic.desc: Each Resilience Break inflicted on the boss by friendly units grants <color=#ec6d21>400</color> Technique Points. It can be triggered up to <color=#ec6d21>5</color> times, granting a total of <color=#ec6d21>2,000</color> points.

mechanic.name: Stellnanite Berserk
mechanic.desc:
The boss starts with 1 stack of Berserk and gains 1 stack every 10s (up to 5 stacks). Each stack increases the boss' DMG by <color=#ec6d21>20%</color>.
Dealing 10 hits to the boss within 2s removes all Berserk stacks. The main Trekker then gains 10 stacks of Amplify (up to 10 stacks). Each hit dealt consumes 1 Amplify stack to increase that hit's DMG by <color=#ec6d21>50%</color>.

mechanic.name: Bounty - Wind Dodger
mechanic.desc: Whenever a boss casts a skill that triggers Tornado, dodging the Tornado grants <color=#ec6d21>450</color> Technique Points. It can be triggered up to <color=#ec6d21>12</color> times, granting a total of <color=#ec6d21>5,400</color> points.

mechanic.name: Stellnanite Berserk
mechanic.desc:
The boss starts with 1 stack of Berserk and gains 1 stack every 10s (up to 5 stacks). Each stack increases the boss' DMG by <color=#ec6d21>20%</color>.
Dealing 10 hits to the boss within 2s removes all Berserk stacks. The main Trekker then gains 10 stacks of Amplify (up to 10 stacks). Each hit dealt consumes 1 Amplify stack to increase that hit's DMG by <color=#ec6d21>50%</color>.

mechanic.name: Bounty - Knife Destroyer
mechanic.desc: Each Blade thrown by the boss and destroyed by friendly units grants <color=#ec6d21>180</color> Technique Points. It can be triggered up to <color=#ec6d21>30</color> times, granting a total of <color=#ec6d21>5,400</color> points.

mechanic.name: Pyro Blight
mechanic.desc:
The boss gains a Fire Ring, increasing their DMG dealt by <color=#ec6d21>30%</color> and continuously dealing DMG to your squad within the ring.
Triggering 3 Elemental Marks on the boss within 5s grants the squad Enhancement, increasing Auto Attack DMG by <color=#ec6d21>30%</color> for 10s, and disables the boss's Fire Ring for 10s.

mechanic.name: Bounty - Blower Bane
mechanic.desc: Whenever a boss casts a skill that triggers Tornado, dodging the Tornado grants <color=#ec6d21>225</color> Technique Points. It can be triggered up to <color=#ec6d21>24</color> times, granting a total of <color=#ec6d21>5,400</color> points.

mechanic.name: Fervent Combat
mechanic.desc: The boss gains 1 stack of Battle Frenzy every 5 seconds, increasing the DMG it deals by <color=#ec6d21>10%</color> (up to 5 stacks). When the Main Trekker triggers a Mark, removes 1 stack of Battle Frenzy from the boss if it has any, restores 20 Energy for the squad, and increases the boss's Ultimate DMG Taken by <color=#ec6d21>100%</color>, lasting for 10s and resets when triggered again.

mechanic.name: Bounty - Combo
mechanic.desc: Dealing continuous DMG to a boss for 5s by friendly units grants <color=#ec6d21>360</color> Technique Points. It can be triggered up to <color=#ec6d21>15</color> times, granting a total of <color=#ec6d21>5,400</color> points.

mechanic.name: Devouring Dark Ring
mechanic.desc:
The boss has Dark Ring, which increases the boss's DMG by <color=#ec6d21>30%</color>. The boss also creates an expanding Dark Ring every 5s that deals DMG.
Dealing 20 hits to the boss within 3s disables the boss's Dark Ring for 15s. The boss also takes <color=#ec6d21>65%</color> more Skill DMG dealt by Support Trekkers during this period.
